There are over 330 traditional medicinal herbs and plants are profiled along with detailed herb descriptions, common names, botanical names, medicinal uses, folklore, and references from the leading herbalists of today and ancient times.Medicinal Herbs Bible is an application containing information over 330 traditional medicinal herbs and plants. For every type of herb included, the following information is available for reference:â High quality photo â Very detailed descriptions of the material â Detailed instructions as to how the herb is used and it's benefitsâ The characteristics of the herb/spiceThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECTThis application has the following features:â An interface to preview all items in one viewâ The ability to bookmark selected item for easier referenceâ Cross-referencing links to other itemâ An item search engineâ Offline browsingâââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.

reviews.title: elderdre
reviews.comment: This is app is great and very timely for me. I just purchased a juicer and the information provided here is priceless. The UI is one of the best I\'ve seen, making it so easy to read and navigate through. I must share with friends, thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My Opinion!
reviews.comment: I like this app for a quick reference, but I really can stand the apps Icon or the intro page before it gets to the herb selection... #JustBeingHonest
reviews.author: Anon Spencer

reviews.title: Nicely Done!
reviews.comment: Comprehensive list with pics, medicinal properties and histories. Very handy to have when shopping. Love the search and bookmark features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Worth having!
reviews.author: Leslie Yetter

reviews.title: Not a beginners guide.
reviews.comment: Its an ok reference tool if you already have a good idea of what herbs do What but that\'s it. It needs a search by symptoms or uses. Like headache, vomiting and wounds or antiseptic, estrengent and emetic.
reviews.author: A Google User
